com.jacobschneider.engine.math

Class Vector3

  • Object
    • Vector3

  • public class Vector3
extends Object
    Immutable 3 dimensional vector class
    Author:
    Jacob

        y - Y component
        z - Z component

      • Vector3

        public Vector3(double[] v)
        Creates a 3D vector from a length 3 array of double.
        Parameters:
        v - Array of length 3 representing a vector. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if an array is passed with an incorrect size.

      • cross

        public Vector3 cross(Vector3 rhs)
        Calculates the cross product of this vector and another vector where this vector is on the left hand side of the operator and the parameter rhs is on the right hand side.
        Parameters:
        rhs - The vector on the right hand side of the cross product operator.
        Returns:
        The cross product between this vector and another vector.

      • projectToPlane

        public Vector3 projectToPlane(Vector3 planeNormal)
        Returns a vector that represents the projection of this vector onto a plane. *
        Parameters:
        planeNormal - The normal of the plane
        Returns:
        The resulting vector after projection has occurred.

      • projectToVector

        public Vector3 projectToVector(Vector3 toVector)
        Projects a vector onto another vector. The resulting vector will have the same direction as the vector in the parameter toVector.
        Parameters:
        toVector - The vector on which to project to.
        Returns:
        The resulting vector after projection has occurred.

      • multMatrixLeft

        public Vector3 multMatrixLeft(Matrix3 lhs)

      • rotate

        public Vector3 rotate(Matrix3 rotMatrix)
        Rotates this vector by a rotation matrix. The rotation matrix passed into this method must be orthogonal (the inverse matrix must equal the transverse matrix).
        Parameters:
        rotMatrix - The orthogonal matrix to rotate by.
        Returns:
        The resulting vector after the rotation has occurred.

      • rotate

        public Vector3 rotate(Quaternion rotQ)
        Rotate a vector by unit quaternion. The quaternion passed into this method must have a magnitude equal to one (normalized).
        Parameters:
        rotQ - The unit quaternion to rotate by.
        Returns:
        The resulting quaternion after rotation.

      • rotationRequired

        public Quaternion rotationRequired(Vector3 other)
        Calculates the rotation required to orient this vector in the direction of other vector.
        Parameters:
        other - The direction you want this vector to be pointed in
        Returns:
        The Quaternion required to rotate this vector

      • randomPerp

        public Vector3 randomPerp()
        Generates a random unit vector that is perpendicular to this vector. If this vector equals zero then it returns zero.
        Returns:
        a vector perpendicular to this vector
